summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Thirteen (13), University Park Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue Northeast and 18th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 6759 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
